seoBasics.headline: SEO basics we ship
seoBasics.description: Every site includes foundational SEO setup to help you show up in local search.

items.title: Clean page titles and meta descriptions
items.description: Each page has a unique, search-friendly title and description.

items.title: Fast page speed
items.description: Optimized images and lean code mean Google ranks you higher.

items.title: Mobile-responsive HTML
items.description: Google prioritizes mobile-friendly sites. Yours will be.

items.title: LocalBusiness schema (optional)
items.description: Structured data that helps search engines understand your business details.

seoBasics.note: We provide foundational SEO only. For ongoing SEO, content strategy, or link building, consider working with an SEO specialist.

items.question: Can I get a domain email address?
items.answer: Yes. We can help you set up a professional email address using your domain (e.g., you@yourbusiness.com). This typically costs $6-12/month through Google Workspace or a similar provider.

items.question: How fast can we launch?
items.answer: Target is 48-72 hours from when we receive your content and photos. If you need it faster, let us know during the discovery call and we'll see what we can do.

items.question: What about SEO?
items.answer: Every site includes foundational SEO: clean code, fast loading, mobile-responsive design, proper meta tags, and optional LocalBusiness schema markup. This gives you a solid starting point. For ongoing SEO strategy, content creation, or link building, we recommend working with an SEO specialist.

items.question: Where do form leads go?
items.answer: Contact form submissions go directly to your email. You'll also receive a notification from Netlify (our hosting platform). All submissions are stored securely and can be exported as a CSV anytime.

items.question: Can customers book appointments?
items.answer: Yes. We integrate Calendly (or your preferred booking tool) so customers can schedule directly from your site. You can embed the calendar inline on a page or have it pop up when they click a button.

items.question: What if I need changes?
items.answer: Just email us. All plans include monthly updates. Small changes (hours, phone number, pricing) are usually handled within 24 hours. Larger updates (new pages, content rewrites) depend on your plan tier.

items.question: Do you handle domain registration?
items.answer: We can help you register a new domain or connect an existing one. Domain registration typically costs $12-15/year and is billed separately.

items.question: Is hosting included?
items.answer: Yes. All plans include fast, secure hosting via Netlify. No extra fees, no surprises.

items.question: Can I see examples?
items.answer: Check out our template gallery to see sample layouts. Each site is customized with your brand, content, and photos.

accessibility.headline: Our commitment to accessibility
accessibility.statement: sitester is committed to building websites that are accessible to all users, including those with disabilities. Every site we build follows WCAG 2.1 Level AA guidelines and includes semantic HTML, keyboard navigation support, and visible focus indicators.

standards.name: WCAG 2.1 Level AA
standards.description: We follow Web Content Accessibility Guidelines to ensure your site is usable by everyone.

standards.name: Semantic HTML
standards.description: Proper heading structure, landmarks, and ARIA labels for screen readers.

standards.name: Keyboard Navigation
standards.description: All interactive elements are accessible via keyboard without requiring a mouse.

standards.name: Color Contrast
standards.description: Text and interactive elements meet WCAG AA contrast requirements (4.5:1 minimum).

local.headline: Resources for local businesses
local.description: Google provides specific guidance on creating accessible local business websites that work well for all customers.

accessibility.feedback: If you encounter any accessibility issues on a sitester website, please contact us so we can address them promptly.
